title: Equipment Consignment
description: Sell your photography equipment through our consignment program.

step1.title: Submit Equipment
step1.description: Send us details about your equipment

step2.title: Evaluation
step2.description: We assess condition and market value

step3.title: List for Sale
step3.description: Your equipment goes live on our platform

step4.title: Get Paid
step4.description: Receive payment when your item sells

cta.title: Start Consignment Process
cta.description: Ready to sell your equipment? Get started with our easy consignment process.
